verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchi<s%>–shua, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.
And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>severe<s%> against <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H4672>hit<s%> <S%H2342>him<s%>, and he was wounded of the <S%H3384>archers<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%>, <S%H8025>Draw<s%> your <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> me through with <S%H6189>it<s%>; lest these uncircumcised <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> <S%H5375>me<s%>. But his armor bearer <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3966>not<s%>; for he was very <S%H3372>afraid<s%>. So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and fell upon <S%H5307>it<s%>.
And when his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%> likewise on the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%>.
So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And when all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead<s%>, then they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>: and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and lived in <S%H3427>them<s%>.

And it came to pass on the next <S%H4283>day<s%>, when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%>, that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>.

And when they had <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H5375>him<s%>, they took his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and his <S%H3627>armor<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, to carry <S%H1319>news<s%> unto their <S%H6091>idols<s%>, and to the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And they <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1538>head<s%> in the <S%H1004>temple<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>.
And when all <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>–gilead <S%H8085>heard<s%> all that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>,

They <S%H6965>arose<s%>, all the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, and took <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H1480>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and the <S%H1480>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> under the <S%H424>oak<s%> in <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> for his <S%H4604>transgression<s%> which he <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even against the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H7592>not<s%>, and also for asking counsel of one that had a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, to inquire of <S%H1875>it<s%>;

And <S%H1875>inquired<s%> not of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: therefore he <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H5437>him<s%>, and turned the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>.
